statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 6 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -11 \\ -19 \\ -30 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ -18 \\ -30 \\ -48 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ 5 \\ 8 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
